button.caption: Save Manifest to Project Folder
button.extendedCaption: Save a metadata listing to the project; on context menu
button.tooltip: Save metadata to the project folder.

button.caption: Download to Project Folder
button.extendedCaption: Download a CAD drawing or bimfile to the project directory; on context menu
button.tooltip: Download to the project folder.

button.caption: New BIM Cloud Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new BIM Cloud connection and add it to the project.
button.tooltip: Connect to BIM Cloud platform. Add the connection to the project. A new BIM Cloud Connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project. The current project already contains a BIM Cloud Connection.

button.caption: Download and Add To Current Map
button.extendedCaption: Download the selected item and add it to the active map; on context menu
button.tooltip: Download and add data to the active map.

button.caption: Map
button.extendedCaption: Download and Add the selected item to a new map; on context menu
button.tooltip: Download and add data to a new map.

button.tooltip: Download and add data to a new scene.

button.caption: Local Scene

button.caption: Sign In

button.caption: Sign Out

button.tooltip: Sign out from BIM Cloud.

button.caption: Get Status
button.extendedCaption: Get the version status of this item
button.tooltip: Check if the source item on the BIM Cloud is on a newer version.

button.caption: Upgrade to Latest Version

button.tooltip: Upgrade this file to the latest supported version.This file is already being upgraded or is at the latest version.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove a server connection from the project; on server connection context menu
button.tooltip: Remove the server connection from the project.

button.caption: Add Server
button.extendedCaption: Add an existing Server connection to the project; on Project Servers container context menu.
button.tooltip:
Add an existing server connection file to the project.
The project saves a reference to the connection file.

button.caption: Add Cloud Storage Connection
button.extendedCaption: Add an existing Cloud Storage Connection to the project.
button.tooltip:
Add an existing cloud storage connection file to the project.
The project saves a reference to the connection file.

button.caption: Add Server
button.extendedCaption: Add an existing Server connection in the user's roaming profile and add it to project favorites; on Favorites default context menu.
button.tooltip:
Add an existing server connection file to project favorites.
Project favorites saves a reference to the connection file.

button.caption: New ArcGIS Server Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new ArcGIS Server connection and add it to the project; on Project Servers container context menu.
button.tooltip:
Connect to ArcGIS Server as a user or publisher. Add the connection to the project.
A new server connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New Cloud Storage Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new Cloud Storgae connection and add it to the project.
button.tooltip:
Connect to Cloud Storage. Add the connection to the project.
A new cloud storage connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New ArcGIS Server Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new ArcGIS Server connection in the user's roaming profile and add it to project favorites; on Favorites default context menu.

tooltip.heading: New ArcGIS Server Connection To Favorites

button.tooltip:
Connect to ArcGIS Server as a user or publisher. Add the connection to the project.
A new server connection file is created in your roaming profile and is referenced by project favorites.

button.caption: New WCS Server Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new WCS Server connection and add it to the project; on Project Servers container context menu.
button.tooltip:
Connect to a WCS Server as a user. Add the connection to the project.
A new server connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New WMS Server Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new WMS Server connection and add it to the project; on Project Servers container context menu.
button.tooltip:
Connect to a WMS Server as a user. Add the connection to the project.
A new server connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New WFS Server Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new WFS Server connection and add it to the project; on Project Servers container context menu.
button.tooltip:
Connect to a WFS Server as a user. Add the connection to the project.
A new server connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New OGC API Server Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new OGC API Server connection and add it to the project; on Project Servers container context menu.
button.tooltip:
Connect to a OGC API Server as a user. Add the connection to the project.
A new server connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New WMTS Server Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new WMTS Server connection and add it to the project; on Project Servers container context menu.
button.tooltip:
Connect to a WMTS Server as a user. Add the connection to the project.
A new server connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New Statistical Data Collection
button.extendedCaption: Create new Statistical Data Collection file in the project; on ribbon.
button.tooltip:
Create new Statistical Data Collection.
The project saves a reference to the statistical data collection file. Available with ArcGIS Business Analyst license.

button.caption: Add Statistical Data Collection
button.extendedCaption: Add an existing Statistical Data Collection to the project; on Statistical Data Collections container context menu.
button.tooltip:
Add an existing statistical data collection file to the project.
The project saves a reference to the statistical data collection file. Available with ArcGIS Business Analyst license.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove a statistical data collection from the project
button.tooltip: Remove the statistical data collection from the project.

button.tooltip: Remove the Statistical Data Collection item from the project.

button.tooltip: Remove the Segmentation Target Group item from the project.

button.tooltip: Remove the Segmentation Profile item from the project.

button.tooltip: Remove the Huff Model Calibration item from the project.

button.caption: Add Folder Connection
button.extendedCaption: Add a new folder connection to the project; on Folders context menu
button.tooltip: Connect to an existing folder on the local computer or a shared folder on the network. Add the connection to the project.

button.caption: Create Folder Connection
button.extendedCaption: Add a new folder connection to the project; on Folders context menu

tooltip.heading: Add selected folder to folder connections

button.tooltip: Connect to an existing folder on the local computer or a shared folder on the network. Add the connection to the project.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove a folder connection from the project; on folder connection context menu
button.tooltip: Remove the folder connection from the project.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove a locator from the project; on locator context menu
button.tooltip: Remove the locator from the project.

button.caption: Properties
button.extendedCaption: View SQLite geodatabase connection properties; on enterprise database context menu
button.tooltip: Displays properties of database.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove a geodatabase from the project; on geodatabase context menus
button.tooltip: Remove the item from the project. The project's reference to the file geodatabase or database connection file is removed. The file geodatabase or database connection file is not deleted.

button.caption: Feature Dataset
button.extendedCaption: Create a new feature dataset in a geodatabase; in New context menu for geodatabases
button.tooltip: Create a new feature dataset in the geodatabase.

button.caption: Feature Class
button.extendedCaption: Import a new feature class into this geodatabase.; in Import context menu for geodatabases and feature datasets
button.tooltip: Import a new feature class into this geodatabase.

button.caption: Feature Class(es)
button.extendedCaption: Import multiple feature classes into this geodatabase.; in Import context menu for geodatabases and feature datasets
button.tooltip: Import multiple feature classes into this geodatabase.

button.caption: Table
button.extendedCaption: Import a table into this geodatabase.; in Import context menu for geodatabases and feature datasets
button.tooltip: Import a table into this geodatabase.

button.caption: Table(s)
button.extendedCaption: Import multiple tables into this geodatabase.; in Import context menu for geodatabases and feature datasets

button.tooltip: Delete a diagram template from the diagram dataset.

button.caption: Parcel Fabric
button.extendedCaption: Create a parcel fabric; in New context menu for feature datasets
button.tooltip: Creates a parcel fabric and its associated datasets. The parcel fabric is created in a feature dataset that resides in a file or an enterprise geodatabase.

button.caption: Add Parcel Type
button.extendedCaption: Add a new parcel type to a parcel fabric; on parcel dataset context menu
button.tooltip: Adds a parcel type to a parcel fabric. A parcel type is defined by a separate polygon and line feature class. Parcel type feature classes are controlled by the parcel fabric dataset.

button.caption: Remove Parcel Type
button.extendedCaption: Removes a parcel type from a parcel fabric
button.tooltip: Removes a parcel type from a parcel fabric.

button.caption: Enable Parcel Topology
button.extendedCaption: Enables topology on a parcel fabric
button.tooltip: Enables topology on a parcel fabric.

button.caption: Disable Parcel Topology
button.extendedCaption: Disables topology on a parcel fabric
button.tooltip: Disables topology on a parcel fabric. System-defined parcel rules and topology rules and parcel fabric feature classes will be removed from the topology.

button.caption: Add To Project
button.extendedCaption: Add a locator to the project; on locator and geocoding service context menu
button.tooltip: Add the locator or geocode service to a project. The project saves a reference to the locator. The added locators can be found in the Locators folder on the Project pane.

button.extendedCaption: Add a locator to the project; on locator and geocoding service context menu
button.tooltip: Displays the properties of the selected locator.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove the item from project favorites; on Favorites item context menu
button.tooltip: Remove the item from project favorites. The reference to the item is removed, but the item is not deleted. The item remains in all projects to which it was previously added.

button.caption: Make Default
button.extendedCaption: Set the selected folder connection as the project's home folder; on folder connection context menu
button.tooltip: Make this folder connection the home folder for the project that is currently open.

button.caption: Make Default
button.extendedCaption: Set the selected geodatabase as the project's default geodatabase; on geodatabase context menu
button.tooltip: Make this geodatabase the default geodatabase for the project that is currently open.

button.tooltip: Display and change the properties used to connect to database.

button.extendedCaption: View metadata for the selected item; on context menu
button.tooltip: View the item's metadata

button.tooltip: Edit the item's metadata

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete a database connection file; on context menu for all database connections
button.tooltip: Delete the database connection file from your file system. The project's reference to the database connection file is removed from the project.

button.caption: Properties
button.extendedCaption: View file geodatabase connection properties; on database context menu
button.tooltip: Displays properties of file geodatabase.

button.caption: Add Parcel Type
button.extendedCaption: Add parcel type; on geodatabase item context menus
button.tooltip: Add parcel type to Parcel Fabric.

button.caption: Import And Open
button.extendedCaption: Import a map, globe, or scene document to the project; on document context menu
button.tooltip:
Import an existing ArcMap, ArcGlobe, or ArcScene document or a map service definition file to the project.
The original data frames and layout are converted to the ArcGIS Pro map and layout format and added to the project. Future changes to the original document are not reflected in the project. One of the new maps or the layout is opened in a view.

button.caption: Add And Open
button.extendedCaption: Add a Pro map to the project; on map file context menu
button.tooltip: A map stored in an ArcGIS Pro map file is added to the project and opened. A copy of the map is added to the project. Future changes to the map file are not reflected in the project.

button.caption: Add And Open
button.extendedCaption: Add a Pro layout to the project; on layout file context menu
button.tooltip: The layout and associated maps stored in the layout file will be added to the project. Only a view of the layout will open.

button.caption: Add And Open
button.extendedCaption: Add a Pro report to the project; on report file context menu
button.tooltip: The report will be added to the project and its view will open.

button.caption: Add And Open
button.extendedCaption: Add a Task File to the project; on task file context menu
button.tooltip: The task file will be added to the project.

button.caption: Add And Open
button.extendedCaption: Add a packaged map to the project; on context menu
button.tooltip: Unpack a map package. Add a copy of the map it contains to the project. Future changes to or downloads of the map package are not reflected in the project.

button.caption: Add And Open
button.extendedCaption: Add a web map or web scene to the project; on context menu
button.tooltip: Converts the web map to an ArcGIS Pro map and adds it to the project.

button.caption: Open Notebook
button.extendedCaption: Open a Pro Notebook; on context menu
button.tooltip: Open the notebook.

button.caption: Download
button.extendedCaption: Download Pro Notebook; on context menu
button.tooltip: Download the notebook to disk.

button.extendedCaption: Add an existing Pro Notebook; on context menu
button.tooltip: Add an existing notebook to the project.

button.tooltip: Create a new notebook and add it to the project.

button.extendedCaption: Add a new Pro Notebook; on context menu
button.tooltip: Create a new notebook.

button.extendedCaption: Create a new file geodatabase; on ribbon
button.tooltip: Create a new file geodatabase on a local or network computer. The new geodatabase is added to the project. The project saves a reference to the file geodatabase.

button.tooltip: Create a new file geodatabase on a local or network computer. The new geodatabase is added to the project. The project saves a reference to the file geodatabase.

button.tooltip: Create a new mobile geodatabase on a local or network computer. The new geodatabase is added to the project. The project saves a reference to the mobile geodatabase.

button.caption: New Database Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new database connection and add it to the project; on ribbon
button.tooltip: Connect to a database such as an enterprise geodatabase. The new connection is added to the project. A new database connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New Database Connection
button.extendedCaption: Create a new database connection; on Project Databases container context menu
button.tooltip: Connect to a database such as an enterprise geodatabase. The new connection is added to the project. A new database connection file is created in the project's home folder and is referenced by the project.

button.caption: New Database Connection

button.tooltip: Connect to a database such as an enterprise geodatabase. The new connection is added to project favorites. A new database connection file is created in your roaming profile and is referenced by project favorites.

button.caption: Contingent Values
button.extendedCaption: Open Contingent Values view for the selected geodatabase item; on context menu
button.tooltip: Edit contingent values.

button.caption: Register As Versioned...
button.extendedCaption: Registers the selected enterprise geodatabase item as versioned; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Register data as versioned to allow concurent editing. Only the data owner can register it as versioned.
Register data as versioned.

button.caption: Unregister As Versioned
button.extendedCaption: Unregisters the selected enterprise geodatabase item as versioned; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Unregister data as versioned. Only the data owner can unregister it as versioned.
Unregister data as versioned.

button.caption: Enable Archiving
button.extendedCaption: Enables archiving on the selected geodatabase item; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Enable archiving on the data. Only the data owner can enable archiving.
Enable archiving on the data.

button.caption: Disable Archiving
button.extendedCaption: Disables archiving on the selected geodatabase item; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Disable archiving on the data. Only the data owner can disable archiving.
Disable archiving on the data.

button.caption: Enable Editor Tracking
button.extendedCaption: Enables editor tracking on the selected geodatabase item; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Enable editor tracking on the data. Only the data owner can enable editor tracking.
Enable editor tracking on the data.

button.caption: Disable Editor Tracking
button.extendedCaption: Disables editor tracking on the selected geodatabase item; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Disable editor tracking on the data. Only the data owner can disable editor tracking.
Disable editor tracking on the data.

button.caption: Enable Attachments
button.extendedCaption: Enables attachments on the selected geodatabase item; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Enable attachments on the data. Only the data owner can enable attachments.
Enable attachments on the data.

button.caption: Disable Attachments
button.extendedCaption: Disables attachments on the selected geodatabase item; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Disable attachments on the data. Only the data owner can disable attachments.
Disable attachments on the data.

button.caption: Add Global IDs
button.extendedCaption: Adds global IDs to a list of geodatabase feature classes, tables, and/or feature datasets; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Adds global IDs to the geodatabase. Only the data owner can add global IDs.
Adds global IDs to the geodatabase.

button.caption: Register with Geodatabase
button.extendedCaption: Registers the selected item with the geodatabase; on context menu
button.tooltip:
Register the data with the Geodatabase.
Register the data with the Geodatabase.

button.caption: Privileges...
button.extendedCaption: Opens the privileges dialog for this item in order to manage access to the item
button.tooltip:
Manage access privileges on this item.
Privilege management is currently unavailable.

button.caption: Compact
button.extendedCaption: Compacts a file geodatabase
button.tooltip:
Compacts this file geodatabase.
Compacts this file geodatabase.

button.caption: Compress
button.extendedCaption: Compresses the data on the selected item
button.tooltip:
Compress this data.
Compress this data.

button.caption: Uncompress
button.extendedCaption: Uncompresses the data on the selected item
button.tooltip:
Uncompress this data.
Uncompress this data.

button.caption: Compress
button.extendedCaption: Compresses the data on the selected item
button.tooltip:
Compress this data.
Compress this data.

button.caption: Uncompress
button.extendedCaption: Uncompresses the data on the selected item
button.tooltip:
Uncompress this data.
Uncompress this data.

button.caption: Add To Project
button.tooltip: Add style to project

button.caption: Add To Project
button.tooltip: Add geoprocessing package to the current project.

button.caption: Add To Project
button.extendedCaption: Add a project favorite item to the current project; on Favorites item context menu
button.tooltip: Add a favorite item to the current project. The project saves a reference to the existing item.

button.caption: Add To New Projects
button.extendedCaption: Automatically add a project favorite item to all new projects that are created; on Favorites item context menu
button.tooltip: Add a favorite item to all new projects. When a new project is created, a reference to the item is automatically added.

button.caption: Add To New Projects
button.extendedCaption: Stop automatically adding a project favorite item to new projects that are created; on Favorites item context menu
button.tooltip: The favorite item will no longer be added to all new projects. The item is not removed from project favorites or previously created projects.

button.caption: Scene Layer Package
button.extendedCaption: Creates scene layer package based on given input
button.tooltip: Create a scene layer package.

button.caption: Locator
button.tooltip: Create a new locator

button.caption: Validate
button.tooltip:
Validate Topology.
Validate Topology.

button.caption: Build
button.extendedCaption: Builds a network dataset; context menu for network datasets
button.tooltip: Builds a network dataset. Reconstructs the network connectivity and attribute information of a network dataset.

button.caption: Network Dataset
button.extendedCaption: Create a network dataset; in New context menu for feature datasets
button.tooltip: Creates a network dataset. The network dataset is created in a feature dataset that resides in a file or an enterprise geodatabase.

button.caption: LRS Hierarchy
button.tooltip:
Show LRS Hierarchy.
Show LRS Hierarchy.

button.caption: Enable Enterprise Geodatabase
button.extendedCaption: Run the Enable Enterprise Geodatabase tool; on (non-geodatabase) database context menu
button.tooltip:
Enable the Enterprise Geodatabase.
Enable the Enterprise Geodatabase.

button.caption: Rename
button.extendedCaption: Rename the selected item; on context menu
button.tooltip: Rename the selected item. For project items that reference a file or folder on disk, the file or folder is renamed in the file system.

dynamicMenu.caption: Delete
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Allows you to delete the selected portal item if you own the item; on context menu

dynamicMenu.caption: Design Views
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Provides access to appropriate design views for the selected item; on context menu

dynamicMenu.caption: Domains View
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Domains view for the selected project item.

dynamicMenu.caption: Fields View
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Fields view for the selected project item.

dynamicMenu.caption: Subtypes View
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Subtypes view for the selected project item.

dynamicMenu.caption: Attribute Rules View
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Attribute Rules view for the selected project item.

dynamicMenu.caption: Contingent Values View
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Contingent Values view for the selected project item.

dynamicMenu.caption: Locators Menu
dynamicMenu.extendedCaption: Locators Menu for the selected project item.
